annotations.description: This workflow is set up as a use case for the first user stories of the proof of concept for using Argo workflows as a starting point for Flowify.
This step reads a well log curve and checks if the log values are within an allowed range and set them to undefined in not.
This component calls an API and stores the result as an artifact
This component takes in a json file and extracts the value of a specific path in the json file and stores this in the filtered-json output parameter
This component collets QC report data and metadata about the Argo workflow in a json file
Copy from Azure file share to an Azure blob storage container
annotations.display-name: Copy from file share to blob
